title: The Last Words Of Twelve Infamous Criminals Will Shock You [Flip Cards]

questions.title: Aileen Wuornos
questions.desc: “I’d just like to say I’m sailing with the Rock and I’ll be back like Independence Day with Jesus, June 6, like the movie, big mothership and all."

questions.title: Barbara Graham

questions.desc: “You sons of bitches. Give my love to Mother.”

questions.title: George Appel
questions.desc: “Well, gentlemen, you are about to see a baked Apple.”

title: Can You Guess The Chick Flick Based On The GIF?
Would You Survive A Plane Crash Deep Into The Forest?

questions.title: You just have survived a plane crash!  But now you are in the middle of the forest!  What should you do first?

answers.title: Scream and shout!  Scream and say HELP!
Run away from your camp and try to find help!  But stay calm and alert!
Give up! Just go jump off a cliff no need to try to survive...
Stay in the place where you crashed.  Stay calm and alert.

questions.title: Its starting to get darker outside. What should you do first?

answers.title: Climb up a tree.  So then no wolves can eat me.
I love bears!  Maybe I should try to find some tonight!
Hide!  I don't want any bears eating me tonight!
Build a shelter to keep me warm tonight.

questions.title: It's dark outside now.  What should you do now?!

answers.title: I should jump into the river to cover my scent from any predators!
I should scream help!  I don't want to become wolf food!!!
Build a fire! No need to freeze to death.
Just die!  Time to give up!

questions.title: It's now morning!  You survived the night.  Now what should you do?

answers.title: Signal for help! Someone needs to find me! HELP!
I should scout the area to make sure no passing animals have came through.
I should be trying to find food!  Anyways I am hungry as hell!
No one has came and helped me!  I should die!

questions.title: It's now been several days.  No one has found you yet.  But you still have hope.  What should you do?

answers.title: Scream for help!  Do anything to get someone's attention! (Build a fire, scream, make signals!)
Just die.  Give up.  No one's gonna find you.
Run away from camp and try to find civilization!  But stay calm!
I'm starting to like the forest!  I would like to stay here and live here now! ^~^

results.title: You barely lived!
results.desc: You panicked a little. You almost starved to death, but you lived! You might have made some wrong decisions there to there, but you lived and found civilization! CONGRATS!

results.title: You died!
results.desc: Sorry to say. You probably lasted a day or two, maybe three. You died. You could not stand a chance! You panic too much, and you went crazy! You most likely died from all symptoms. Sorry but not sorry!

title: “Whose Side Are You On” In Marvel’s Civil War?

questions.title: Which do you value more: freedom or security?

results.title: You are Team Iron Man! You loyally uphold the passage of the Registration Act. You hope that this will ensure the safety of both the citizen population and Heroes through the Fifty-State Initiative.

Like the X-Men and Black Panther in the comics, you remain on neutral ground. You choose neither side and instead refuse to fight or join a cause. While this choice may be appealing so you don't have to break your heart, you just might end up injured in the crossfire anyways.
You are Team Cap! You oppose the Registration Act and value the freedom of superheroes across the world. You stand to keep citizens and heroes alike safe from any dangers.
You are Team Iron Man! You loyally uphold the passage of the Registration Act. You hope that this will ensure the safety of both the citizen population and Heroes through the Fifty-State Initiative.

You are Team Cap! You oppose the Registration Act and value the freedom of superheroes across the world. You stand to keep citizens and heroes alike safe from any dangers.

answers.title: No, but I did it by accident a few times.

answers.title: Only if the service is really bad.

answers.title: Yes. Hey, they could've said no!

answers.title: Yes, but I didn't think it was bad.

answers.title: Yes. All is fair in love and war.
Sure, but I would say I was sorry after.
